embeddings.description: Embedding references associated with this artifact. Provides stable pointers without embedding raw data.
embeddings.x_constraints: Each object must include: provider, sector, dim, quantized, vector_ref. No inline vectors permitted.

indices.waypoint_ids.description: Identifiers for retrieval or resonance "waypoints" associated with this artifact.

indices.sector_weights.description: Weight distribution across memory sectors used by recall engines.
indices.sector_weights.x_constraints: Must include keys: episodic, semantic, procedural, emotional, reflective. Values 0.0–1.0.
